entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Blowing snow at times this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
